verses.verse: There is an <S%H2165>appointed<s%> <S%H2165>time<s%> for <S%H3605>everything.<s%> And there is a <S%H6256>time<s%> for <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2656>event<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> –

A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H3205>give<s%> <S%H3205>birth,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H4191>die;<s%> A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H5193>plant,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6131>uproot<s%> what is <S%H5193>planted.<s%>
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H2026>kill,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7495>heal;<s%> A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6555>tear<s%> <S%H6555>down,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> up.
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1058>weep,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7832>laugh;<s%> A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H5594>mourn,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7540>dance.<s%>

A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7993>throw<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H3664>gather<s%> <S%H68>stones;<s%> A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H2263>embrace,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7368>shun<s%> <S%H2263>embracing.<s%>
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1245>search,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to give up as lost; A <S%H6>time<s%> to <S%H6>keep,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H8104>throw<s%> <S%H6256>away.<s%>

A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7167>tear<s%> <S%H7167>apart,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H8609>sew<s%> <S%H8609>together;<s%> A <S%H6256>time<s%> to be <S%H2814>silent,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1696>speak.<s%>
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H157>love,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H8130>hate;<s%> A <S%H6256>time<s%> for <S%H4421>war,<s%> and a <S%H6256>time<s%> for <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
<S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H3504>profit<s%> is there to the <S%H6213>worker<s%> from that in <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6001>toils<s%>?
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6045>task<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> with which to <S%H9419>occupy<s%> themselves.

He has <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> <S%H3303>appropriate<s%> in its <S%H6256>time.<s%> He has <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H5769>eternity<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H1097>yet<s%> <S%H1097>so<s%> that <S%H120>man<s%> will not <S%H4672>find<s%> out the <S%H4639>work<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> even to the <S%H5490>end.<s%>

I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> for them <S%H3588>than<s%> <S%H518><s%> to <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%> in one's <S%H9132>lifetime;<s%>

<S%H1571>moreover,<s%> that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7945>who<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> and <S%H8354>drinks<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5999>labor<s%> – it is the <S%H4991>gift<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3605>everything<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> will <S%H1961>remain<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>nothing<s%> to <S%H3254>add<s%> to it and <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>nothing<s%> to <S%H1639>take<s%> from it, for <S%H430>God<s%> has [so] <S%H6213>worked<s%> that men should <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him.

That <S%H4100>which<s%> <S%H7945><s%> is has <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H3528>already,<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> will be has <S%H3528>already<s%> <S%H1961>been,<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> what has <S%H7291>passed<s%> by.

<S%H5750>Furthermore,<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> [that] in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H4941>justice<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> is <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> and in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> is <S%H7562>wickedness.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3820>myself,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> will <S%H8199>judge<s%> both the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man,<s%>" for a <S%H6256>time<s%> for <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2656>matter<s%> and for <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4639>deed<s%> is <S%H8033>there.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3820>myself<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H1700><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has surely <S%H1305>tested<s%> them in order for them to <S%H7200>see<s%> that they are but <S%H929>beasts.<s%>"

For the <S%H4745>fate<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> and the <S%H4745>fate<s%> of <S%H929>beasts<s%> is the <S%H259>same.<s%> As <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H4194>dies<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H4194>dies<s%> the <S%H2088>other;<s%> indeed, they <S%H3605>all<s%> have the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4195>advantage<s%> for <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4480>over<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> from the <S%H6083>dust<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> that the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5927>ascends<s%> <S%H4605>upward<s%> and the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of the <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H3381>descends<s%> <S%H4295>downward<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>?

And I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> that <S%H369>nothing<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> that <S%H120>man<s%> should be <S%H8055>happy<s%> in his <S%H4639>activities,<s%> for that is his <S%H2506>lot.<s%> For <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> will <S%H1961>occur<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him?
